lore.biomeswevegone.florus.stem_sapling:
A cactus-like wood type.
I'm not sure how to replant it...
lore.biomeswevegone.maple_sapling: A good tree, unfortunately named after a former friend.
lore.biomeswevegone.red_maple_sapling: The tree name reminds me of Canada...
lore.biomeswevegone.skyris: A foreign type of tree found by that hare.
lore.biomeswevegone.yellow_sakura_saplin: A type of tree that seems to be popular with anime watchers.
lore.biomeswevegone.white_sakura_sapling: A type of tree that seems to be popular with anime watchers.
lore.create.hand_crank: A hand-turned crank to power my saw.
lore.create.mechanical_saw: A saw utility. Good for cutting down trees fast.
lore.minecraft.allium: A nice flower. Too bad I don't need it...
lore.minecraft.birch_sapling: A nice, white type of tree.
lore.minecraft.cactus: That kind of hurts, but it gets me green dye.
lore.minecraft.calcite: I know a gnome friend who likes these.
lore.minecraft.cherry_sapling: A type of tree commonly used by weebs.
lore.minecraft.dark_oak_sapling: I know a gnome friend who likes this kind of tree.
lore.minecraft.dandelion: A nice flower. Too bad I don't need it...
lore.minecraft.dirt:
An essential building lore.for farming.
Need to find me a lot of these...
lore.minecraft.green_banner: The color is almost after my favorite color...
lore.minecraft.kelp: I almost wish I could smoke this.
lore.minecraft.oak_sapling: An oak tree. The easiest type to farm.
lore.minecraft.obsidian: An element for nether portals. Really hard to break...
lore.minecraft.player_head: The disembodied head of a player.
lore.minecraft.powder_snow: A terrible lore.that inflicts entrapment and cruel cold.
lore.minecraft.sand: The hare can give me dirt if I get her this.
lore.minecraft.spruce_sapling: A spruce tree. An easy type to come across.
lore.minecraft.sugar_cane:
A good lore.for making Paper.
How do I farm this again?
lore.minecraft.torch: A simple utility that brings light.
lore.minecraft.tnt: A simple bomb. Are these Taph's?
lore.minecraft.apple: A healthy snack while you work!
lore.minecraft.bone:
A good treat for a good boy.
When crushed up, it makes a good fertilizer.
lore.minecraft.bone_meal: An amazing fertilizer for grass and trees.
lore.minecraft.diamond: A solid ore for making tools.
lore.minecraft.diamond_axe: Whiteclaw wants another victim. And mending.
lore.minecraft.diamond_pickaxe:
A good utility for mining Obsidian.
I should get Mending before I main one of these...
lore.minecraft.diamond_shovel: A tool for the long haul.
lore.minecraft.dried_kelp:
A sea-based item for eating.
Kind of stale and hard to eat...
lore.minecraft.ender_pearl: I can throw these on my own, why do I need these?
lore.minecraft.iron_ingot:
A disposable ore for throwaway tools.
Also good for making anvils!
lore.minecraft.milk_bucket: A simple drink to take off the buzz.
lore.minecraft.sweet_berries:
A delicious snack for a fox.
These seem rare to come by.
lore.minecraft.water_bucket: A good MLG trick. But touching water hurts...
lore.minecraft.wheat_seeds: I used to throw these away. I still do.
lore.biomeswevegone.blueberries:
A nice, home grown snack.
Doesn't fill like red berries do.
lore.aether.blue_berry: A nice snack. It seems to come from another universe...
lore.aether.zanite_ore: Amazing gems that speed up as they wear down.
lore.aether.zanite_shovel: A fast shovel, but by the time you noticed its speed, it's too late.
lore.aether.gravitite_shovel:
A very efficient mining tool.
Makes dirt, gravel and sand go bye bye if you right click!
lore.farmersdelight.onion:
An alright snack.
I should bake with these instead of eating them raw...
lore.origins.orb_of_origin: A shiny orb that lets you change your family lineage.
lore.minecraft.rotten_flesh: Filling to wolves, but hard to down.
lore.minecraft.wooden_axe: Good for early game, but useless otherwise...
